review: Bought it having no idea what it was about.. a rounding up purchase...but was not diappointed.Simply put, it's a great quirky little physics game.  At times it feels like herding cats, quickly rolling into 'I'm an idiot' when you realise the solution.10/10 if you get it for the right price.
A cross between real time strategy, flight simulator and survival horror.It was much like my first sexual experience, quick and confusing, but I was ready to go again straight away.10/10
